title: 'Guys dont fall for the ratings'
body: I play apex legends, valorant, other FPS and story driven games. This mouse pad is fake, it calls itself speed type but doesn't have any grip at all. If you like playing multiplayer games don't buy this, instead buy some hard mouse pad which will give good sense for the mouse. I even changed my mouse to a gaming mouse thinking its the mouse but this company doesn't know what an actual mousepad for gaming is, they just made some cheap thing and selling for 350-500 on average. Overall I would say it makes tracking of your mouse to be worst.
